message: A cloud of poisonous smoke starts to fill the arena!

outcomes.message: {victim} [Vis|are] engulfed in the cloud of poisonous smoke!
{victim} sacrifice[Vs|] themsel[Vf|ves] so {attacker} can get away!
{attacker} slowly push[Aes|] {victim} closer into the cloud until they can't resist anymore!
{attacker}, and {victim} agree to die in the cloud together, but {attacker} pushes {victim} in without warning!
{victim} decide to run into the cloud together!
